div.p: If your panel displays charts using a saved report created with Splunk's Report Builder, then the chart automatically uses the formatting defined in Report Builder. Use the <searchName> tag to reference the saved report. A chart option specified in the simple XML code for the panel overrides the saved settings. Panels that use an inline search with the <searchString> tag should also specify chart formatting options inline.
